price: 62. (Moisés) dijo: “¡No lo harán! Mi Señor está conmigo y me guiará”.
arabic: قَالَ كَلَّآۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبِّي سَيَهۡدِينِ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qāla kallā inna maʿiya rabbī sayahdīni
